name: Catenaccio Football Manager
description:
Catenaccio Football Manager is a simulation Soccer Managerial game

Start your career with a team from the minor leagues, try to get promoted to higher levels to face the best players all over the world!

Main features of Catenaccio Football Manager:

- Challenge other managers all over the world

- Perpetual seasons, your team will follow you forever!

- Custom engine simulator

Catenaccio Football Manager has a custom engine that will simulate faithfully the development of the match, taking into consideration the specific values of the players, the tactics of both teams, the influence of the stadium and, like in every sport, luck can change the final results!

Every day you will face other managers, so be careful to check your formation to line up your bests 11, taking into consideration injury, tired players and suspensions

Besides the daily match, remember to train your players to improve their soccer skills. It's also important that your players are always at the top of their shape, so make sure to hire the best doctors and physical therapists available!

There are several game modes, useful both for earning money and to trying new tactics. Use your coach skills in:

- World Cup: defeat each national selection!

- Knockout Cup: fight in this elimination tournament, available in three different difficulties

- The Tower: face the levels, each one has a particular opponent or specific tactical condition

- Friendly match: you can try experimental formations against players of different levels

At the end of the season, your team will go to training and some players will increase their skills while some of them may get worst or even retire!

What's better than having your team evolve from season to season and seeing your young protégé become a world-class top player?

Catenaccio Football Manager: be the best manager!
